requirements.summary: Populate Product Name dropdown options in ProductFormModal from the existing React Query products list (actor.listProducts) and handle loading/error states
acceptanceCriteria: In ProductFormModal, the Product Name Select renders options derived from the backend products list (e.g., product.name).
The hardcoded PRODUCT_NAMES constant is no longer used for the Product Name dropdown options.
The dropdown handles backend loading and error states without crashing (e.g., disables the select and/or shows a simple message/state while loading or on error).

file_operations.description: Replace the hardcoded PRODUCT_NAMES-based options with options derived from the existing React Query products query (useProducts / actor.listProducts), mapping to product.name (optionally de-duped/sorted) and adding safe loading/error UI states (e.g., disabled SelectTrigger while loading, simple in-dropdown message on error). Use the shadcn-ui Select/SelectContent composition (read-only ui components via props/className). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Constrain Product Name dropdown list height and enable internal vertical scrolling for many options
acceptanceCriteria: When the Product Name options exceed the visible area, the dropdown list becomes vertically scrollable using native/default scrolling behavior.
The dropdown list height is constrained (e.g., via a max-height class on the SelectContent) so it does not expand beyond the viewport.

file_operations.description: Make the Product Name dropdown list scroll by constraining SelectContent height (e.g., max-height) and enabling overflow-y auto on the dropdown list container using className props (do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui). Use the shadcn-ui SelectContent styling hook points. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
